page.title: 09A large agricultural farm 3
page.content: We pull the farm implements with a tractor. We cultivate the land with cultivators (various) and ploughs. We sow the grain with a drill. I sometimes help my dad to irrigate the potatoe fields. The irrigator is a long length of piping with wheels. It has a motor to help it move. After it has watered one section of the field, my dad operates the motor to move it so the other parts of the field get watered. The water is pumped from the dykes and carried in pipes to the irrigator. The jet of water travels about 20 metres. The house I live in is owned by the farm. The farm is over 1000 acres. This isn't the biggest fen farm some are over 3000 acres. If my father stopped working for the farm we would have to move house.
